option.name: content
option.value: Avoid overly verbose descriptions. Do not append statements to the end describing the overall effect, reason for, or result of the changes on the application

task.summary: Default task

Add initial solution and application for TheMetz project
Includes .gitignore, a WPF application using .NET 8.0, and ADO pull request data processing services. Also adds project configuration files for Visual Studio and JetBrains Rider IDEs.

Refactor pull request handling and add modular services.
Replaces AdoDataService with modular services for better code structure. Adds PullRequestService, PullRequestCommentService, and TeamMemberService for handling specific functionalities. Introduces new Startup configuration, AppSettings model, and updates workspace settings to support refactored logic and .NET 8.0 WPF application setup.

Add support for closed PR statistics in UI and services
Introduced functionality to fetch and display closed pull request statistics. Added methods to `PullRequestStatsService` for closed PR data processing, UI controls in `MainWindow.xaml/xaml.cs` for displaying closed PR data, and updated data models to handle closed PR links. Refinements were also made to optimize code structure and functionality.

Add functionality to display reviewed PRs in UI
Implemented backend and UI updates to fetch, process, and display reviewed pull requests for each developer. Added methods to `PullRequestStatsService` for reviewed PR handling and extended `MainWindow.xaml` to show corresponding data. Streamlined code by removing unused `PullRequestResponse` models.

Remove unused methods and streamline PR reviewer stats handling.
Removed an unused method from `TeamMemberService` to improve code clarity. Optimized dictionary operations in `PullRequestStatsService` by using `TryAdd` and `TryGetValue` for cleaner handling and reduced redundancy. These changes enhance maintainability and efficiency of the codebase.

Add `PrRepository` with SQLite support and update `MainWindow` logic
Introduced `PrRepository` to handle SQLite-based pull request operations and implemented the required CRUD functionalities. Updated `MainWindow` to integrate `IWorkItemService` and streamlined the PR-related features by removing redundant methods. This lays the foundation for better data handling and interface enhancements.

Add new pull request methods and update SQLite schema
Introduced multiple new methods to the `IPrRepository` interface and its implementation to improve pull request querying capabilities (e.g., by opened/closed dates or ADO pull request IDs). Additionally, updated SQLite database schema, including JSON-related improvements and refined collation settings. These changes enhance functionality and database compatibility.

Add pull request updates and UI enhancements
Introduced new methods in `PullRequestService` for fetching PRs by opened/closed dates and added a UI button to trigger PR updates. Refactored services to improve PR handling and updated `MainWindow` to display a loading indicator during operations. These changes enhance usability and streamline pull request management.

Remove Comments.xaml.cs and database file
Deleted the Comments.xaml.cs class and the associated database file as they are no longer needed. This cleanup removes unused functionality and reduces project complexity.

Refactor days slider value handling in PR and comment stats
Replaced static DaysControl method calls with instance-level methods for improved design and encapsulation. Updated related XAML partial classes to use the new method for fetching slider values, eliminating redundant parameters and streamlining code.

Refactor variable names and remove unused imports
Replaced ambiguous variable names in ViewModels with more meaningful ones for better readability and clarity. Removed unused imports across multiple files to clean up the codebase and improve maintainability. These changes streamline the code and enhance developer productivity.

Refactor comment counting logic and enhance data models
Updated `ShowCommentCounts` in `PullRequestCommentService` to include total reviews alongside comments, improving statistics granularity. Adjusted related ViewModels and logic to display both metrics in the UI. Increased slider range to support extended data fetching. Minor repository and configuration updates for better maintainability.

Add methods for updating and querying pull requests, improve repository logic
Enhanced `IPrRepository` with methods for updating pull requests by ADO ID and querying open PRs. Updated `PullRequestService` to incorporate efficient handling of open PRs and real-time updates. Adjusted `PullRequestCommentService` logic to exclude self-reviews during PR filtering. These changes increase functionality and improve code maintainability.

Add work item statistics functionality and UI integration
Implemented work item statistics feature, including methods in `IWorkItemService` and `WorkItemService` for querying work items by developer and date. Added `WorkItemStatsViewModel` for data handling and `WorkItemStats.xaml` for user interface. Updated `MainWindow.xaml` to integrate the new feature, enabling the display and interaction with work item data.
Remove unused `GetWorkItems` method from `WorkItemService` and clean up imports.
Ensure distinct work item IDs in `WorkItemService` and batch fetch requests for improved performance.
Integrate new F# implementation for `PullRequestService` and `IPrRepository` with updated DI configuration.
Update SQLite data source configuration and dataSources XML files.
Refine `WorkItemService` query to include 'Done' state filter and update UI by removing unused test button.
Update `.gitignore` to exclude `.db` files.
Update `.gitignore` to exclude `idea/*` directory.
Update `.gitignore` to exclude `idea/*` directory.
Update `.gitignore` to standardize `.idea/*` exclusion pattern.

MESSAGE.value:
Remove Comments.xaml.cs and database file
Deleted the Comments.xaml.cs class and the associated database file as they are no longer needed. This cleanup removes unused functionality and reduces project complexity.

Refactor days slider value handling in PR and comment stats
Replaced static DaysControl method calls with instance-level methods for improved design and encapsulation. Updated related XAML partial classes to use the new method for fetching slider values, eliminating redundant parameters and streamlining code.

Refactor variable names and remove unused imports
Replaced ambiguous variable names in ViewModels with more meaningful ones for better readability and clarity. Removed unused imports across multiple files to clean up the codebase and improve maintainability. These changes streamline the code and enhance developer productivity.

Refactor comment counting logic and enhance data models
Updated `ShowCommentCounts` in `PullRequestCommentService` to include total reviews alongside comments, improving statistics granularity. Adjusted related ViewModels and logic to display both metrics in the UI. Increased slider range to support extended data fetching. Minor repository and configuration updates for better maintainability.

Add methods for updating and querying pull requests, improve repository logic
Enhanced `IPrRepository` with methods for updating pull requests by ADO ID and querying open PRs. Updated `PullRequestService` to incorporate efficient handling of open PRs and real-time updates. Adjusted `PullRequestCommentService` logic to exclude self-reviews during PR filtering. These changes increase functionality and improve code maintainability.

Add work item tracking and developer activity features to UI
Introduced `WorkItemStatsViewModel` and `WorkItemDomainModel` to track developer activity on work items. Updated `WorkItemService` with new methods for retrieving and grouping work items by developer and project. Added `WorkItemStats` partial class with UI enhancements, integrated into `MainWindow`. Refactored XAML files to include a new tab for work item statistics, improving application functionality and dev activity tracking.

Add work item tracking functionality and integrate it into UI
Introduced methods in `WorkItemService` for fetching developer-specific and project-specific work items. Added `WorkItemStatsViewModel` to handle related data and logic. Updated the UI with a new `WorkItemStats` partial class to display work items and integrated it into `MainWindow.xaml`. These changes enhance functionality by enabling work item tracking and visualization.

Add work item data integration and update UI components
Introduced methods in `WorkItemService` to retrieve and process work items by developer and date. Added `WorkItemStatsViewModel` and new XAML partial for displaying work item statistics. Updated `MainWindow` to integrate work item data retrieval, along with corresponding buttons and controls for improved UI functionality. These updates enhance work item tracking and visualization capabilities.

Add work item tracking functionality and UI integration
Introduced comprehensive work item tracking features in `IWorkItemService`, including methods to fetch work items by developer, query work items since a specific date, and track developer references. Added `WorkItemStatsViewModel` for managing work item data and updated `MainWindow` and new `WorkItemStats.xaml` for UI integration. These changes improve visibility into work item activity and enhance overall project monitoring capabilities.

Add work item tracking functionality and UI integration
Introduced methods in `WorkItemService` for fetching and organizing work items based on developers and recent activity. Added `WorkItemDomainModel` and `WorkItemStatsViewModel` for enhanced data management. Integrated a new `WorkItemStats` user control and updated `MainWindow.xaml` to include a dedicated tab for work item statistics. These changes improve tracking and visualization of developer contributions.

Add work item statistics functionality and UI integration
Implemented work item statistics feature, including methods in `IWorkItemService` and `WorkItemService` for querying work items by developer and date. Added `WorkItemStatsViewModel` for data handling and `WorkItemStats.xaml` for user interface. Updated `MainWindow.xaml` to integrate the new feature, enabling the display and interaction with work item data.
Remove unused `GetWorkItems` method and clean up `IWorkItemService` interface
Remove unused `GetWorkItems` method from `WorkItemService` and clean up imports.
Ensure distinct work item IDs in `WorkItemService` and batch fetch requests for improved performance.
Introduce `PullRequestService` in F# and integrate with `IPrRepository` for pull request handling.
Integrate new F# implementation for `PullRequestService` and `IPrRepository` with updated DI configuration.
Update SQLite data source configuration and dataSources XML files.
Remove obsolete SQLite data source XML configuration.
Remove SQLite data source configuration file.
Refine work item query to include recently closed items; remove unused `TestWorkItems` button from UI.
Filter work items by state and remove obsolete test button in MainWindow.
Refine `WorkItemService` query to include 'Done' state filter and update UI by removing unused test button.
Update `.gitignore` to exclude `.db` files.
Update `.gitignore` to exclude `idea/*` directory.
Update `.gitignore` to standardize `.idea/*` exclusion pattern.
